mapper.select: -- selectCouponList SELECT A.CouponID AS intCouponID ,A.CouponNo AS strCouponNo ,A.EmailAddr AS strEmailAddr ,A.PubYMD AS strPubYMD ,A.UseYMD AS strUseYMD ,A.UseStateCode AS intUseStateCode ,CASE WHEN A.UseStateCode = 1 THEN '미사용' WHEN A.UseStateCode = 2 THEN '사용완료' ELSE '사용불가' END AS strUseStateCode ,DATE_FORMAT(A.RegDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS strRegDate ,DATE_FORMAT(A.UpdDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS strUpdDatetcouponmst FROM TCouponMst A ORDER BY A.RegDate DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TCouponMst (CouponNo, EmailAddr, PubYMD, UseStateCode) VALUES (#{strCouponNo}, #{strEmailAddr}, DATE_FORMAT(current_timestamp(), '%Y%m%d'), 1)
